槑字的基本解释

槑
méi
古同“梅”。

槑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méi］
［《廣韻》莫杯切，平灰，明。］
“坆1”的今字。亦作“栂1”。亦作“楳1”。亦作“槑1”。“某2”的今字。
(1)落叶乔木。种类很多。叶卵形，早春开花，以白色、淡红色为主，味清香。果球形，立夏后熟，生青熟黄，味酸，可生食，也用以制成蜜饯、果酱等食品。未熟果加工成乌梅，供药用。花供观赏。
(2)指梅花。也指腊梅科的腊梅花。
(3)指梅树的果实。可食，亦可用作调味品。
(4)指柟木。即楠木。
(5)谓盐梅。喻指宰辅重臣。
(6)指杨梅。
(7)悲酸貌。参见“梅目”。
(8)节候名。
(9)姓。

槑字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槑； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页546第14
【玉篇】古文梅字。註見七畫。

槑
Basic explanation of words
槑
méi
Gu Tong "Mei".
槑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méi］
["Guangyun" Mo cup cut, flat gray, bright. ]
The present character of "坆1". Also known as "栂1". Also known as "楳1". Also known as "槑1". The present word for "some 2".
(1) Deciduous trees. many kinds of. The leaves are ovoid and bloom in early spring. They are mainly white and light red with a delicate fragrance. The fruit is spherical, ripe after the beginning of summer, green, ripe and yellow, sour in taste, and can be eaten raw. It is also used to make preserves, jams and other foods. Unripe fruits are processed into ebony plum for medicinal use. Flowers for viewing.
(2) Refers to plum blossoms. Also refers to the winter plum flower of the winter plum family.
(3) Refers to the fruit of plum trees. It is edible and can also be used as a condiment.
(4) Refers to nanmu. Namely nanmu.
(5) It is called salt plum. Yu refers to Zaifu and heavy ministers.
(6) Refers to bayberry.
(7) Sad and sour appearance. See "Mayme".
(8) Festival name.
(9) Last name.
槑
